name: Own Worst Enemy (Vorld)
description:
A short game consisting of five levels, where you play as a wizard attempting to collect of all the soul crystals in the realm. Bodies are temporary, but souls are eternal. Whatever kills your body is possessed by your soul. Make use of this boon to yield the power of all five crystals, the whisper of the soul cairn compels you. Good luck.

Made by Lexiclarity and VORLD
